name: platform-and-cd-tools
seoTitle: Platform Engineering And Continuous Delivery Tools
seoDescription: CI/CD platforms and deployment engines like Jenkins, GitLab, CircleCI, Argo CD, and Spinnaker.

children.seoDescription: Jenkins project site with pipelines, plugins, and guides for building CI/CD.

children.name: circleci-cloud
children.seoDescription: CircleCI platform for automated testing, workflows, and delivery across languages.

children.name: argo-cd-docs

children.name: spinnaker-platform
